body_html:
I found and ran: C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.156\windows\mkl\bin\mklvars.bat
to setup my environment variables for MKL and then re-ran cuda90.bat. That allowed all of the variables relating to MKL to be detected.

Now I think the only thing missing is NNPACK.
How would I go about getting that included?

body:
I found and ran: `C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.156\windows\mkl\bin\mklvars.bat`
to setup my environment variables for MKL and then re-ran `cuda90.bat`. That allowed all of the variables relating to MKL to be detected.

Now I think the only thing missing is NNPACK. 
How would I go about getting that included?
